00010 void gnuCompile(MavenCompiler* c) {
00011         // bug #55: get rid of precompiling?
00012         /*string cmd = string("g++ -c ");
00013         cmd += extraLibraries.join(" ") + " ";
00014         cmd += option_n + ".cpp -o " + option_n + ".o";*/
00015         
00016         string mavencorelib = combinePaths(c->binDirectory + "/", c->iniFile.getKey("directories.lib")) + "libmavencore.a";
00017         string cmd = string("g++ -O3 ");
00018         for(int i = 0; i < c->extraLibraries.length(); ++i)
00019                 cmd += string("\"") + trim(c->extraLibraries[i]) + "\" ";
00020         cmd += string("\"") + c->option_n + ".cpp\" \"" + mavencorelib + "\" -o \"" + c->option_n + "\"";
00021         
00022         //cout << "Debug: " << cmd << endl;
00023         system(cmd.c_str());
00024 }
